sort: 13
---

# Default preset

Here are the default preset settings:

```yml
presets:
  default:
    markup: auto
    formats: [original]
    widths: [400, 600, 800, 1000]
    fallback_width: 800
    fallback_format: original
    noscript: false
    link_source: false
    quality: 75
    data_sizes: true
    gravity: center
    dimension_attributes: false
```
